ABC SCHOOL OF ENGLISH COURSES

Callan Method

The main focus is on speaking, listening and pronunciation.

General English

The focus is on grammar, reading, writing and listening skills.

Intensive English

Full immersion in the English language and one of the most popular courses in our school.

One-to-one

We arrange private lessons in which you can decide exactly what you want to learn.
